name: OTN Gag
description:
I'm pretty sure this has already been done, but I decided to give it a go anyways. When used, this LoRA produces an over-the-nose (OTN) cloth gag with reasonable consistency. I found it sometimes results in a over-the-mouth (OTM) gag, some kind of neck covering, or no gag whatsoever. The knot of the gag sometimes shows too, but isn't perfect either. Best of luck!

A weight of around 1.0 seems to be fine

Trigger keyword:

OTN

Potentially useful negatives:

scarf, bandana, nose

modelVersions.name: v1.0
modelVersions.description: Trained on 275 images, some of which are cropped to split multiple characters or remove non-OTN parts. Used 5 repeats, batch size of 5, for 10 epochs on animefull-final-pruned. Chose epoch 7 for this release because it seemed that higher ones were more prone to turning the gags into gaiters.
